title: On the River Maine below Angers: (a) Cliffs near the Mouth of the Maine; (b) Village of la Pointe; (c) Distant View Upriver towards Angers; (d) Cliffs on the Right Bank of the Maine; (e) Angers, Seen Beyond Cliffs; (f) Angers from the South-West
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
